item.title: Why Nano Server
item.description: A common question that gets raised around new Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview is around Why we should deploy Nano Server and whatâ€™s the benefit. In this blog post I will discuss few benefits when using Nano Server deployment Method. Starting with Windows Server 2012, we had 3 deployment options Server Core Deployment Option MinShell Deployment Option Full Desktop Experience Deployment Option Back then, for deployments such as Hyper-V it was recommended to deploy Server Core due to limited attack surface and reduced patches/hotfixes which we had to deploy.
